meanings.definition: A person who serves food or drinks to customers.
meanings.sent1: The server brought our drinks to the table with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant server took our orders efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The server accidentally spilled water on a customer, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She was like a graceful server, gliding between tables effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The server's friendly attitude made the dining experience enjoyable.

meanings.definition: A computer program or device that provides functionality to other programs or devices.
meanings.sent1: The server stored all our important files securely.
meanings.sent2: The IT team set up a new server for the office network.
meanings.sent3: The server seemed to have a mind of its own, responding to commands instantly.
meanings.sent4: The server acted as the brain of the entire system, managing data flow seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: Without the server, the computers wouldn't be able to communicate with each other.

meanings.definition: A person who serves in a particular role or function.
meanings.sent1: As a server in the event, she ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The team captain acted as the server during the game, passing the ball skillfully.
meanings.sent3: The server of justice made sure everyone got a fair trial.
meanings.sent4: He was the server of wisdom, guiding others with his knowledge.
meanings.sent5: In his role as a server, he always put the needs of others before his own.
